## read in data

```{r}

lobster_abundance <- read_csv("../data/Lobster_Abundance_All_Years_20220829.csv")

```
## convert data

```{r}
lobster_abundance <- lobster_abundance %>% 
    mutate(SIZE_MM = na_if(SIZE_MM, -99999))

```
